welcome.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage
welcome.content: Welcome to our award-winning adults-only caravan park, set in 7¬Ω acres of meticulously maintained lawns and landscaped grounds in Cheshire's Vale Royal region. Surrounded by farmland and away from main roads, our tranquil location provides the perfect escape for a relaxing break.Our touring park is open from March until 2 January each year, offering 41 super pitches and 30 seasonal pitches. We accommodate caravans, motorhomes and privately owned holiday homes, with excellent facilities and easy access to Chester.‚úèÔ∏è

reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: Read reviews from our satisfied guests

items.name: Sarah & John M.
items.title: Perfect peaceful getaway
items.comment: Absolutely loved our stay at Lamb Cottage. The facilities were spotless, the staff were friendly, and the location is perfect for exploring Cheshire. We'll definitely be back!

items.name: David & Margaret T.
items.title: Excellent facilities
items.comment: The shower facilities are like a luxury hotel! Everything is so clean and well-maintained. The adults-only policy makes it so peaceful and relaxing.

items.name: Robert & Linda K.
items.title: Beautiful countryside location
items.comment: What a gem! Beautiful countryside setting, excellent facilities, and so convenient for visiting Chester and the surrounding area. Highly recommended.
